name: Tomb Scavenger
description:
Explore the dungeon in search of great treasures and get out... only if you can remember your way back. Enjoy your try and submit your score :D

Post-jam update

Added a highscore screen to show a global leaderboard.

Controls (Not shown in-game) Game PhaseExploring dungeon
EscapingMovementWASD
WASD
Open Chest
Space-Look-Around-Mouse (Left-Click to toggle mouse capture mode)
Sprint-Left Shift
